name: Stay Alive (Dmitrii)
description:
An effective vaccine against the zombie virus has long been created, but the epidemic continues in remote areas. As a result of a shipwreck, the main character finds himself on a deserted island dominated by a zombie virus.

Timely vaccination saves from infection, but in the wild you have to fight thirst, hunger and fatigue. The task of the character is to stay alive and find a way to return home.

Explore the World, reveal secrets. Develop skills, get new opportunities. Get resources, create items. Prepare food and medicines.
